structure.unit: ARTICLE X. LOCAL BUSINESS TAX RECEIPT IN UNINCORPORATED AREAS

law.catch_line: Unclassified businesses not otherwise provided for.

text.section:
Sec. 8A-238.1. Unclassified businesses not otherwise provided for.
Every person engaged in the operation of any business profession or occupation not specifically referenced under any other provision of this article shall pay a local business tax as an unclassified business as provided for in the schedule of taxes, for each place of business.
